ceo.label: CEO Message
ceo.title: CEO Message
ceo.intro: Raon Total Solution aims to be your premier partner, maximizing customer value through 30 years of accumulated experience and technical expertise in the oil refinery, petrochemical, and shipbuilding industries.
ceo.quote:
All employees of Raon Total Solution
will continue to strive
to provide the highest quality and service
under the belief of 'customer first'.
ceo.partnership: Through close cooperation with global partners, we supply the latest technology and products domestically, and together we create your success through rapid delivery and professional technical support.
ceo.commitment: We will continue to grow as a trusted business partner that provides the highest value to our customers through unwavering trust and innovation.

shipbuilding.heroDescription: Supplying high-quality marine parts as the Korean agent for Chinese cylinder liner manufacturer (WTQ) located in Yangzhou
shipbuilding.imageCaption: High-quality cylinder liners and marine equipment used in large-scale shipbuilding sites
shipbuilding.intro1: We are the Korean agent for WTQ, a cylinder liner manufacturer located in Yangzhou, China, supplying cylinder liners with diameters ranging from 480 to 1500mm.
shipbuilding.intro2: WTQ is one of the major manufacturers in China producing ship main engine cylinder liners, and opened a Korean agency in 2025.
shipbuilding.intro3: We guarantee stable quality and rapid delivery with globally certified products.
services: Cylinder liners for commercial vehicles, construction machinery, and locomotives
Cylinder liners for ships and marine use
Liners for sludge pumps and hydraulic cylinders
Cylinder liners for compressors and generator units

overview.title: Industry Overview
overview.description: The power generation industry is a core industry that produces electricity through various generation methods including thermal, combined cycle, and renewable energy. Power plants require high-performance rotating machinery such as turbines and compressors that operate continuously in high-temperature, high-pressure environments.

items.title: Continuous Operation
items.description: High reliability needed for 24-hour uninterrupted operation

items.title: High Temperature & Pressure
items.description: Stable performance under extreme operating conditions

items.title: Maintenance Efficiency
items.description: Minimizing planned maintenance periods and preventing unplanned shutdowns

items.title: Life Extension
items.description: Need to extend component life due to equipment aging

home.title: Trusted Partners
home.description: Global partners and major domestic clients working together
home.clientsDescription: Growing together with Korea's key industries

globalPartners.title: Global Partners
globalPartners.description: We supply only stable and verified parts through official partnerships and agency contracts with world-class manufacturers.

spxflow.description: Agitator / Side entry mixer specialist. Brands: Lightnin, Stelzer, Plenty, Philadelphia, Uutechnic
spxflow.highlight: The world's largest mixing equipment manufacturer

neumanEsser.description: Founded in Germany in 1830. Reciprocating compressor After market and Revamping specialist
neumanEsser.highlight: Future energy infrastructure integrated solutions. Clients: SK Energy, S-Oil, Hyundai Chemical (Daesan)

castanet.description: Reciprocating compressor parts specialist (Piston Ring, Rider Ring, Packing Ring, Oil Scraper Packing)
castanet.highlight: Main Sub-Vendor for Howden Thomassen Compressor (Netherlands). Reverse Engineering capability for all compressor brands

kbDelta.description: Reciprocating compressor valve Spare Parts specialist
kbDelta.highlight: Owns Engineering Plastic raw material and Spring manufacturing subsidiaries. Supplies to Hoerbiger, COOK, CPI valve makers

turbolink.description: Venture startup founded in 2001. Fluid film bearing design, manufacturing and engineering specialist
turbolink.highlight: From 65,000 RPM ultra-high speed turbo compressor bearings to hundreds of tons heavy load bearings

wtq.description: Founded in 1967. Compressor and marine cylinder liner specialist manufacturer
wtq.highlight: 900 employees, assets of 150 billion KRW. Clients: Cummins, Caterpillar, MAN, Wartsila. Over 58% market share in China

cpPump.description: Headquartered in Zofingen, Switzerland. High-precision chemical process pumps and specialty pumps
cpPump.highlight: Leak-free (Magnetic drive) design. Specialized in sanitary equipment and bio-industry sterilization processes

fima.description: Founded in Germany in 1964. Turbo Compressor & Blower specialist
fima.highlight: World's leading technology in Zone 0 blowers for explosion-proof/hermetic applications

ldw.description: Founded in 1915, headquartered in Bremen, Germany. DC motor/generator (10~8,000Kw), large 3-phase induction motors, synchronous generators

syt.description: Domestic oil purification equipment specialist manufacturer

trustSection.experience: With 30 years of experience, we are a trusted partner providing the highest quality parts and technical services to major energy, chemical, and heavy industry companies in Korea.

businessInfo.companyName: Company: Raon Total Solution Co., Ltd.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy Policy of Raon Total Solution

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following personal information for inquiry handling and customer support: name, company name, email address, phone number, and inquiry details. The collected information is used solely for customer inquiry response and service provision.

usage.title: 2. Use of Information
usage.content: The collected personal information is used for responding to customer inquiries, providing product and service information, and delivering quotations. We do not use personal information for purposes other than those collected without consent.

protection.title: 3. Information Protection
protection.content: We implement technical and administrative security measures to protect personal information. Personal information is encrypted and stored, and only authorized personnel can access it.

contact.title: 4. Contact Information
contact.content: For inquiries regarding personal information processing, please contact us at: Email: rts@raontotalsolution.co.kr / Phone: +82-2-575-3051

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms of Service for Raon Total Solution website

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.content: These Terms of Service aim to establish the basic terms and conditions for the use of website services provided by Raon Total Solution (hereinafter referred to as 'Company').

service.title: 2. Service Usage
service.content: The Company provides services including product information, technical consultation, and quotation inquiries. Services are available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, unless there are special business or technical circumstances.

liability.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The Company is exempt from liability for service provision when services cannot be provided due to force majeure such as natural disasters. The Company is not responsible for service disruptions caused by user negligence.

copyright.title: 4. Copyright
copyright.content: All content on the website (text, images, logos, etc.) is owned by the Company. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or transmission is prohibited under copyright law.
